leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研代理-工具调用与工作流编排生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 规划→调用→追踪→回放→评测→治理

queries: [WEB] generate nextflow pipeline with llm github
[WEB] bioinformatics workflow automation using llm github

tools.name: Maestro
tools.one_line_profile: Declarative multi-agent workflow orchestration framework for quantum computing research
tools.detailed_description: Maestro is an agent orchestration framework designed to manage complex, multi-agent workflows in a declarative manner. It is specifically positioned within the AI4Quantum ecosystem to facilitate the coordination of AI agents for quantum computing tasks, enabling the synthesis and execution of research workflows.

tools.name: FlowAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent framework for automating bioinformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: FlowAgent is an advanced multi-agent framework specifically designed to automate complex bioinformatics workflows. It leverages agentic capabilities to manage and execute tasks within biological data analysis pipelines.

tools.name: HaVen
tools.one_line_profile: Hallucination-mitigated LLM for Verilog code generation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Large Language Model framework designed to generate Verilog code for hardware description, incorporating hallucination mitigation techniques to align with HDL engineering standards.

tools.name: AutoBA
tools.one_line_profile: AI Agent for Fully Automated Multi-omic Analyses
tools.detailed_description: An autonomous AI agent framework designed to execute fully automated multi-omic analysis pipelines, streamlining bioinformatics workflows and data interpretation.

tools.name: BRAD
tools.one_line_profile: LLM powered agent for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model powered agent specifically tailored for bioinformatics tasks, capable of interacting with databases, running tools, and assisting in literature mining.

tools.name: Gmsh.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for Gmsh mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A Julia interface to the Gmsh three-dimensional finite element mesh generator, enabling parametric model construction and automatic mesh generation within scientific FEM pipelines.

tools.name: Triangulate.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia Wrapper for the Triangle Mesh Generator
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the Triangle library, providing robust 2D mesh generation and Delaunay triangulation capabilities for scientific computing and simulation.

tools.name: wrap
tools.one_line_profile: MPI wrapper generator for PMPI tool libraries
tools.detailed_description: A code generation tool from LLNL that creates MPI wrappers, facilitating the development of PMPI-based profiling, tracing, and debugging tools for High Performance Computing (HPC) applications.

tools.name: GenoMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent framework for scientific analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: A minimalist multi-agent framework designed for the robust automation of scientific analysis workflows, with specific applications in gene expression analysis and bioinformatics.

tools.name: SpikeAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal LLM-based AI agent for spike sorting
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent leveraging multimodal Large Language Models to automate and standardize the spike sorting pipeline, a critical task in neuroscience for analyzing neuronal activity.

tools.name: artificial-data-generator
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for generating anonymous artificial NHS health data
tools.detailed_description: A toolset from NHS Digital for generating large volumes of synthetic, anonymous data that statistically mimics real National Health Service (NHS) data, enabling research and system testing without compromising patient privacy.

tools.name: ToolOrchestra
tools.one_line_profile: RL training framework for orchestrating tools and agentic workflows
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end Reinforcement Learning framework from NVIDIA Research designed to train agents for orchestrating complex tool usage and workflows, applicable to scientific agent development.

tools.name: Project-Eucalyptus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for satellite-based methane detection
tools.detailed_description: Open-source pipelines for detecting methane plumes using satellite imagery (Sentinel-2, Landsat, EMIT), including segmentation models, synthetic plume generators, and benchmarking tools for earth science research.

tools.name: mikropml-snakemake-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake template for mikropml machine learning pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow template designed for building reproducible and scalable machine learning pipelines using the mikropml package, specifically tailored for microbiology and predictive modeling tasks.

tools.name: conv3d-video-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: 3D ConvNet pipeline for video-based behavior classification
tools.detailed_description: A modular toolkit for video-based behavior classification using 3D Convolutional Networks, providing pipelines for data preparation, training, and inference, suitable for scientific behavioral analysis.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB program for 2D fracture mechanics simulation using Extended Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab solver for fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid. It uses XFEM to discretise the solid continuum and implements crack growth criteria like maximum tension and minimum total energy.

tools.name: ilus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline generator for WGS/WES variant calling using GATK and Sentieon
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight variant calling pipeline generator designed for whole-genome sequencing (WGS) and whole exome sequencing (WES) data analysis. It automates the generation of analysis scripts based on GATK and Sentieon best practices.

tools.name: metapipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline generator and runtime system for genomics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by TorkamaniLab for generating and executing genomics analysis pipelines. It facilitates the creation of job scripts and manages the runtime execution of bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: ASReview Makita
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow generator for simulation studies in systematic reviews
tools.detailed_description: Makita (MAKe IT Automatic) is a workflow generator for the ASReview LAB ecosystem. It automates the creation of scripts and folder structures required for running large-scale simulation studies on scientific literature, aiding in systematic reviews and meta-analyses.

tools.name: BIA (BioInformatics Agent)
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent for automating bioinformatics workflows and data analysis
tools.detailed_description: BIA (BioInformatics Agent) leverages Large Language Models to reshape bioinformatics workflows. It acts as an intelligent assistant to automate data processing, analysis tasks, and tool invocation within the bioinformatics domain.

tools.name: BioChatter
tools.one_line_profile: Backend library for conversational AI and knowledge graph interaction in biomedicine
tools.detailed_description: BioChatter is a backend library designed to facilitate conversational AI applications in biomedicine. It orchestrates interactions between Large Language Models (LLMs) and biomedical knowledge graphs/databases, enabling efficient querying and data retrieval for scientific research.

tools.name: BioCypher
tools.one_line_profile: A unifying framework for biomedical research knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: BioCypher is a framework designed to democratize the creation and use of Knowledge Graphs (KGs) in biomedical research. It provides a modular system to harmonize diverse biomedical datasets, facilitating the construction of knowledge graphs that can be used for AI-driven analysis and reasoning.

tools.name: Geniac
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Configuration Generator and Installer for Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Geniac is a set of utilities designed to implement best practices for the development and deployment of bioinformatics analysis pipelines using Nextflow. It automates the generation of configuration files and installation processes, streamlining the setup of reproducible scientific workflows.

tools.name: cwltool
tools.one_line_profile: Common Workflow Language reference implementation
tools.detailed_description: cwltool is the reference implementation of the Common Workflow Language (CWL) standard. It serves as a portable and reproducible executor for scientific workflows defined in CWL, allowing researchers to run complex data analysis pipelines across various computing environments.

tools.name: MeshPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for 2D/3D simplicial mesh generation (Triangle, TetGen, Gmsh)
tools.detailed_description: MeshPy provides a Pythonic wrapper around high-quality mesh generation software including Triangle (2D), TetGen (3D), and Gmsh. It is essential for scientific computing tasks such as Finite Element Analysis (FEA) and Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), allowing for the programmatic generation and manipulation of complex geometric discretizations.

tools.name: Struo
tools.one_line_profile: A pipeline for building custom metagenomic profiling databases (GTDB/NCBI)
tools.detailed_description: Struo is a tool designed to construct custom databases for metagenomic profilers like Kraken2, Bracken, and Humann3. It automates the retrieval and processing of genome data from NCBI and GTDB, facilitating the creation of reference databases for microbiome analysis.

tools.name: TaskWeaver
tools.one_line_profile: A code-first agent framework for planning and executing data analytics tasks
tools.detailed_description: TaskWeaver is a framework that enables LLMs to plan and execute complex data analytics workflows by generating and running code (typically Python). It is specifically designed to handle stateful data processing tasks, making it a powerful tool for scientific data analysis and automated reporting.

tools.name: ProtGraph
tools.one_line_profile: A graph generator for protein structures from PDB files
tools.detailed_description: ProtGraph is a bioinformatics tool that converts protein structures (PDB format) into graph representations. These graphs capture the structural and spatial relationships of amino acids, enabling the application of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for protein property prediction and modeling.

tools.name: AIA-Academic-Illustrator
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for generating academic diagrams from paper abstracts
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent that automates the creation of standard academic diagrams (e.g., for CVPR/NeurIPS) by implementing a 'Logic (Architect) -> Vision (Renderer)' workflow to transform paper abstracts into high-fidelity scientific illustrations.

tools.name: SatGen
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-analytical satellite galaxy and dark matter halo generator
tools.detailed_description: A semi-analytical generator for simulating satellite galaxies and dark matter halos, used in astrophysical modeling and cosmological simulations to study galaxy formation and evolution.

tools.name: SimStudio
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source platform to build and deploy AI agent workflows visually
tools.detailed_description: SimStudio is a drag-and-drop platform for building, testing, and deploying AI agent workflows. It allows users to orchestrate LLMs and tools into complex agents without extensive coding, serving as a workflow synthesis and execution environment for AI agents.

tools.name: Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable bioinformatics workflow management system
tools.detailed_description: Snakemake is a workflow management system that aims to reduce the complexity of creating workflows by providing a fast and comfortable execution environment, together with a clean and modern specification language in Python style. It is widely used for reproducible and scalable data analyses in science.

tools.name: Agent SOP
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language workflow framework for AI agents
tools.detailed_description: Agent SOP (Standard Operating Procedure) provides a framework for defining natural language workflows that enable AI agents to perform complex, multi-step tasks with consistency and reliability. It structures agent reasoning and execution patterns.

tools.name: HOHQMesh.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the HOHQMesh high-order mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: HOHQMesh.jl provides a Julia interface to the HOHQMesh mesh generator, enabling the creation of curved quadrilateral and hexahedral meshes for high-order numerical simulations in physics and engineering.

tools.name: Waldiez
tools.one_line_profile: Visual orchestration tool for multi-agent collaboration
tools.detailed_description: Waldiez is a flow-based editor and orchestration tool for AutoGen (AG2) agents. It allows users to visually design, configure, and execute multi-agent workflows, facilitating the creation of complex agentic systems for various tasks.
